metadata.name: Amandine
metadata.description:
I made this character for my girlfriend.
She has charm tears and cannot have more than 6 red hearts. and a creep when she has more than three soul hearts.
I added a tainted version which cannot have special hearts with bait tears and blood creep.
Hope you'll enjoy too.
---
C'est pour toi mon amour ! Merci de m'avoir encourager ! Je t'aime Amandine <3
